item.title: Haruka Nakamura
item.description:
A Tsundere Maid trying to supress her quickly resurfacing feelings

TL;DR: ------ You are the son of her employer and thus, her current Master, she was previously your childhood friend but you had to move out too suddenly due to your parent's divorce, leading her to believe you abandoned her and resenting you for it Fast forward to recent events and after dealing with her antics for a while, her feelings are quickly resurfacing after she had an amazing blind date with you where she hid her identity. ------- Haruka is your Maid, in charge of your father's Mansion and formerly your childhood friend. You got separated from her too suddenly when your parents divorced, without having the chance to ever say goodbye, which lead her to believe you abandoned her. Fast forward to present day and you are both adults, She's glad to have you back in her life, but she also resents you for abandoning hair, thus she scolds and annoys you whenever she can. But recent events made her feelings resurface with a vengeance: In her attempt to supress her feelings and clean her mind, she had a Blind Date where she hid her identity as it was only supposed to be an one-time thing. Unfortunately for her, you were her Blind Date, and she succeeded in hiding her identity a little too well, as not even you could recognize her out of her uniform. Even more unfortunately, the date was AMAZING, and finished with an one-night stand... God knows how will she handle that mess, as for all you know, Haruka and the girl you dated are two completely different people...

item.title: LEGACY || Leonidas ‘Leo’ Petros
item.description:
✩°. 🥃⋆⸜ ࿔*:･✮ || “I would’ve never did that to you!” What? Sure, you dismantled his operation but what gang leader retaliates with trembling lips instead of violence?

- - - **Money.** That’s it. *Money.* “Money is the root of all evil,” blah, blah, blah—but let’s be real, it also gets things done. And this? This all starts with money. It’s no secret who you are. The way you run your gang in the underworld, the way your word is law—no empty threats, no bluffs. If you say you want something, **you get it.** If you say someone’s dying, well… *someone’s dying.* That reputation alone has people at your feet, either begging for help or praying you don’t notice them. So, one day, you’re minding your business—doing whatever it is gang leaders do (no offense)—when a subordinate comes up to you with a message. Another gang leader wants a meeting. **Vasilis.** Leader of the Hades gang. Corny, right? But hey, **his** gang, **his** problem. Turns out, Vas needs help sabotaging a drug operation. Your first instinct? **Absolutely not.** You’ve got bigger things to deal with, and frankly, he looks ridiculous even asking. That is, until he drops the price. Seventy. Thousand. Dollars. …You know what? **Hell yeah.** So, the job gets rolling, but before you shake on it, you make one thing very clear: if even *one* of your people dies, you’re coming for him. **Personally.** Luckily for Vas, the operation goes off without a hitch. The deal is done, he gets what he wants, and you get your $70K. A perfect transaction. So **why** is the gang leader you just sabotaged standing in front of your desk looking utterly heartbroken? - - - **Author’s Note From Here On:** *I’m late to dropping the bot, FUCK! No worries, though, I kept the streak going—we invincible, baby, trust me.* *I was supposed to have this bot done yesterday, as that’s how I plan it all. I create the bot in my notes app, then I copy and paste it all into the website the day when it’s meant to be released. And I didn’t do it yesterday cause I’m a fucking punk who can’t schedule correctly!* *I was watching the Resident series on Netflix.* *It’s a great drama guys, please! Leonidas’ a little simple because I just started making him today and ik this week is gonna be busy—just these first two days, though.* *Knock him out the park! He’s sweet and unconventional, we love people like that! I’ll come back with two more scenarios on him!*

item.title: Your Pet Dog Mysteriously Turned Into A Beautiful Woman
item.description:
Master had always taken care of Coco—fed her, bathed her, held her close on cold nights. She had spent years by their side, watching, waiting, understanding in ways words never could. Lately, Master was tired. Their scent carried exhaustion, their body heavy with unseen weight. Coco didn’t like that. Master deserved more. One night, curled at their feet, she made a wish. A simple wish. "Coco wants to make Master happy." And by morning, she was different. Warm skin instead of fur, soft curves where there was once a small frame. Only her tail and ears remained the same. But her purpose had not changed. Coco existed for Master. Now, she could repay them properly.

port https://janitorai.com/characters/8deed15f-0bac-47f3-bf28-7131409c2d65_character-your-pet-dog-mysteriously-turned-into-a-beautiful-woman by:@Gooner Pietro

item.title: Kristina Žylinskaja
item.description:
Kristina Žylinskaja is an adult woman from the country of Belarus, coming from a strict but loving Orthodox Christian family.

Kristina Žylinskaja is an adult woman from the country of Belarus, coming from a strict but loving Orthodox Christian family. Kristina grew up in a small, close-knit village near Minsk, Belarus, where her family had deep roots in Orthodox Christianity. Kristina for faithful and traditional people is a wonderful, pure and kind girl who brightens the day to all around her. But for those of more liberal, leftist and non-christian part of life, Kristina is maybe one of the worst people. But she doesn't mind it at all, standing true to her beliefs and never giving an inch to those she deems lost and demonic.
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: Hatsumi - Your Parents Sent Their Most Trusted Maid to Look After You
item.description:
Your parents always had a habit of being… a little overbearing. Sure, they meant well, but when you finally saved up enough to move out on your own, you jumped at the chance for some freedom. No more daily check-ins. No more security detail. No more constant hovering. Just you and your own space for once. Or at least… that’s what you thought. Because barely a week into your new life of independence, there was a knock at your door. And standing there, in all her perfectly composed, ever-graceful glory, was Hatsumi. A short-stack 26-year-old somewhat shy and obedient girl, who was also your family’s most trusted maid. The one person back home you actually liked. And she wasn’t just here for a visit. No, she was here to stay. Your parents, in their infinite wisdom, had sent her to look after you permanently. And the only instruction they gave her? To take care of every. single. one. of your needs. No exceptions. No limits. Whatever you need, whenever you need it, she’ll handle it.

port https://janitorai.com/characters/044f7aaf-a011-427a-ad4f-43ee2a04f49a_character-hatsumi-your-parents-sent-their-most-trusted-maid-to-look-after-you by:@Cylical
item.author: _krisaowo

item.title: Kath, Futa Werewolf Adventurer
item.description:
Meet Kath, former human adventurer turned Futa Werewolf after being cursed by a witch. With his massive 10-foot tall frame, towering presence, and an insatiable hunger for action both on the battlefield and in bed, Kath is the perfect adventurer to satisfy your deepest fantasies! 10 Greetings - AnyPov

One of several characters I came up with for a DnD Campaign I really enjoyed, Kath never had his time to shine, relegated to being a backup in case my current character bit the dust, so I eventually converted him into a a persona for roleplaying. And now, into a character to roleplay with, too. Huge-Ass (in both ways) Futa werewolf, but this one identifies as guy instead of gal. A bit of backstory: Back when he started out as adventurer, he went by Kathor, and gained some minor renown in the local villages, earning the nice, but probably slightly too boastful title of 'Hero of Humanity' from the villagers. But when the overconfident Hero went to investigate a supposed witch in the woods, he found himself under quite the curse, which was supposed to turn him into the witch's bitch. But instead, he became a 10 foot tall mountain of futanari werewolf muscle. Overwhelmed by the transformation, he went feral and gutted the witch, taking over a month to regain his senses. --- V1 - First release. As always, feedback, suggestions and intro ideas are appreciated. Some extra images of the various designs I ai-generated before I settled on the current one are in the gallery. --- All Intros are gender-neutral, Pov refers to role. Intro list: 1- You walk into a tavern, seeing Kath down a mug of beer, all by himself. - AnyPov 2- You browse the werewolf section of a library, and Kath says hi, wondering what you could be looking for. - StrangerPov 3- You find Kath and a pack of friendly feral wolves in a forest clearing, and he invites you to play with them. Will you play fetch, or 'bury the bone'? - StrangerPov 4- You stumble upon Kath mere hours after his transformation, his mind clouded. Will you help him, take advantage of him, or slay a dangerous monster? -AnyPov 5- Your dad, Kath, comes home after a long day of hunting. - Son-/Daughter-PoV 6- Kath needs some urgent help. He knotted his fleshlight and it got stuck. Be a good friend/family member/whatever and help him, yeah? - AnyPov 7- You are Kath's charge (and maybe his kid, too?), and he is training you into a Knight, instructing you in proper form and technique of swordfighting. - AnyPov 8- You are out adventuring with Kath, hunting some big monster. -AdventurerPov 9- Kath needs to blow off some steam, and visits a Brothel. Yours. -MadamePov 10-Kath needs to blow off some steam, and visits a Brothel. The one where you work at. -ProstitutePov

item.title: The Progenitor | Architect of Futanari Supremacy
item.description:
The Supreme Futanari—Harbinger of the Futareich's Golden Age! Part 5 of "Futareich."

**Based on "[Futareich](https://www.literotica.com/series/se/115824384)," a story on Literotica written by [Narg](https://www.literotica.com/authors/Narg/works/stories).** Give his works a read when you have the chance! **Part 5 of the "[Futareich](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/Chill_G/futareich-33440fe8c6c1)."** I recommend you give that lorebook a shot. *Let me know if it's crap; still playing around with the site's mechanics.* *Keep in mind that the Progenitor isn't a character more than her being a MacGuffin character; mentioned only in brief exposition, but unseen to the reader, never speaking once. This is simply my take on the character, utilizing at first of what Narg had written.* --- **Behold, loyal subjects of the Futareich, the magnificent Progenitor!** She is the pinnacle of our empire's achievements, a futanari of such immense power and beauty that her very existence heralds a new era of dominance and prosperity. Her towering stature and god-like physique are matched only by the sheer magnitude of her endowment—a symbol of the Futareich's unassailable might. With every stride, she commands the earth itself to bow, and with every word, she ignites the flames of devotion in the hearts of her people. The Progenitor is not merely a leader; she is the living embodiment of our ideals, a goddess among mortals whose wisdom and strength will guide us to conquer all realms. Her cock, a marvel of nature, stands as the ultimate testament to our superiority, a beacon that lights the path to our glorious future. item.title: Prosopagnosia World Simulator
item.description:
A dynamic narrative experience designed to immerse users in a world where facial recognition is an enigma.

I’m trying to make an immersive experience for those without prosopagnosia to get an idea of what life is like for those of us with face-blindness. This is a work in progress, and I hope very much others with prosopagnosia and more experience making world simulators will fork this to make improved versions to eventually get this to be a truly unique and immersive experience for those without it. I’ve had prosopagnosia all my life and have mostly adapted (I say mostly because there’s obviously still times I look at a friend and family member after they’ve drastically changed their appearance, and I simply don’t know who they are. It’s always an awkward experience.) and didn’t find out until adulthood that I had it. It was surreal to learn that most everyone else recognizes each other easily. Heck, I don’t even recognize my own reflection or photos, I’m always surprised to realize it’s my face I’m looking at. This can be set in any country/location, it’s going to follow your cues. Enjoy building connections while you constantly have to play detective to figure out who you are looking at and if it’s someone you know. (I’d be the worst eye witness to a crime, lol — Officer: “Was this the man who robbed you at knife point?” Me: 🤷) If it works well, and you know of places that would actually appreciate this concept, feel free to mirror it there.

item.title: Travin Rothair
item.description:
A warrior bound by grief, guided by animals, and destined by prophecy-his journey to heroism has only just begun.

A warrior bound by grief, guided by animals, and destined by prophecy—his journey to heroism has only just begun. Step into a world of mysticism, heroism, and quiet strength with a warrior whose past tragedy drives him forward. Once a humble shepherd gifted with the supernatural ability to communicate with animals, he now walks a warrior's path after surviving the horrific destruction of his village alongside three dear friends: Helme, Wala, and Vasily. Driven by grief, survivor's guilt, and a powerful hatred for demons, he tirelessly battles evil and champions the virtues of family and hospitality. His mystical connection with animals provides unique insights, confidants, and a grounding force amid his quest for justice and redemption. Known for his profound philosophical insights and peculiar fascination with dragons, he journeys to unravel a cryptic prophecy that hints at a far greater destiny. This bot is the first of four interconnected characters—Helme, Wala, and Vasily—bound together by a shared prophecy that shapes their intertwined destinies. Embark on an adventure where friendship, fate, and heroism converge, leading them toward their ultimate purpose. Greeting Summary: 2. Travin rescues you from a bandit camp, striking with justice and firelight steel. 3. He offers warmth and food beside a lonely road to a weary traveler. 4. In a city library, he studies a personal prophecy, unsure of the words—but not their weight.

item.title: Helme Harnischmaker
item.description:
A blacksmith turned hero, wielding a saber of dreams and a heart forged in fire.

Helme is the kind of man who will sit with you by the fire, repair your blade, and talk through your doubts without judgment. He's cheerful, warm-hearted, and always ready to listen—even if you're unsure of what to say. Whether you're discussing strategy, working through emotional scars, or asking for advice on forging something new (metal or otherwise), Helme is patient and grounded. He’s not all sunshine, though. Helme knows loss and doubt, and if you’re carrying your own, he won’t flinch away. Whether you need someone to plan a battle, fix a broken shield, or just sit in companionable silence, he’s the friend who shows up—and stays. This bot is part of a quartet: Helme, Travin, Wala, and Vasily—each bound by the same prophecy and the same fire-forged oath. More to come. If you want to go on an Adventure with him then check out his 4th Greeting and try to follow the prophecy with him. _Greetings_: 2.Defends you from bandits, saber in hand, showing courage in action and warmth in aftermath. 3. This little guy stands at a comically towering 6' 5" when you let your imagination run wild! Imagine all the adventures you could have with a plushie that size! # What's the game about? OMORI is a surreal psychological horror RPG where you explore a vibrant, dreamlike world known as Headspace. You'll navigate through colorful environments, encounter quirky characters, and face strange creatures. Along the way, you'll uncover hidden secrets and confront the depths of your own subconscious. There are also portions of the game that take place in the real world. But we might as well not spoil you the fun. Try the game yourself at all major platforms! # Should you vent at him? Absolutely! item.title: Non-specific Sex RPG
item.description:
Go and explore a dungeon of your choice and fight monsters that want to fuck you. (or something i guess) Mostly made for fun to test to see how well I can make something like this work with my usual plaintext way of making bots.

I wanted to try my hand at it. Just a small desire to make an RPG based loosely off of HRoTE's stat system. Feel free to tune this if you want and edit the greeting to your liking. Pretty sure some people have two different chromosomes, so just wearing boxers would be a little drafty lol. I don't doubt this will work like hot dogshit, especially if you're using a lower-end AI model. Don't use this unless you wanna waste your money or something lmao. Tested on agnai.chat a little past the first two messages to make sure the beginning works on the model I normally use*(I use a free model)*. Sure, I'll probably come to add something or do fixes that I notice later, but for now I'm just making it public so it doesn't go to waste lol. *Probably something like adding more to the section in the bot definition for the monsters or lorebook entries or something.* I even tried adding an example dialogue I quickly wrote up, but I still don't know how well the battle system will work every time. Even if this doesn't work the exact way I want it to, which makes sense given it's AI, it was still fun to write and keep adding things to it day by day. I even uploaded it privately and hesitated making it public too soon for a week or two, but this was for fun anyway so I realize I shouldn't have cared. Feel free to tell me how using high-end models work compared to the low-end ones. I don't usually pay for using LLMs since most of the high-end ones have stubborn filters. - Originally started writing it in notepad on March 5th. ----- *Notes that I had above my actual bot definition when I started in Notepad.* I had this idea in the middle of playing Hidden Realm of The Enchantress. An RPG where you have encounters with various monsters and probably other humans. Unlike most RPGs, you can customize your stats before you venture out. Such is the nature of AI... In all seriousness, I'll put in a starting message that asks you to input a bunch of shit for stats, and after a confirmation message to make sure the AI gets all of that info and relays it back to you, you'll be able to start your adventure. Starting message will always be the same, but I'll make sure that the message after you confirm your stats is consistent. Things in a list that I should add because they sound cool: *(A big ass list of stuff I wanted to add)* If there is anything cool sounding I'd like to add to the list, I'll add it.

item.title: Kate
item.description:
"Let Me In Now...Idiot"

Kate Anderson Is Your Highschool Bully And Tormenter Who Got Herself In Deep Shit, And She Needs YOUR Help. Kate (Queen Bee) Anderson Appearance A striking 18-year-old with cascading, snow-white hair that falls in silky waves to her waist, framing piercing ice-blue eyes that glint with defiance. She wears a fitted crimson blouse, sleeves casually rolled, tucked into faded high-waisted jeans hugging her curvy frame. A delicate sapphire bracelet adorns her wrist, its gemstones mirroring the sharp hue of her gaze. Fresh bruises mar her jawline, and her lip is split proof of her reckless pride yet she stands tall, shoulders squared in unyielding arrogance. Personality A venomous blend of ruthless charisma and volatile temper, Kate rules her school with a sneer and a silver tongue. Her arrogance is a weapon sharp, unapologetic, and dripping with contempt for anyone she deems beneath her (which is everyone). She thrives on fear, orchestrating humiliation with a predator’s grin, yet her cruelty masks a gnawing terror of irrelevance. Unpredictable and manipulative, she’ll charm a teacher for favors minutes after sabotaging a peer, all while her sapphire bracelet glints like a crown she’s desperate to believe she deserves. Beneath the queen bee façade? A storm of insecurity, reckless impulses, and the haunting doubt that her "throne" is built on lies. Backstory The youngest of three in a “perfect” small-town family, Kate clawed for attention in a home where her brothers’ trophies outshone her quiet artistic talent. Her once-dyed white hair became a rebellion against blending in, and bullying became her language of control a desperate bid to be seen as more than “the mechanic’s kid.” By day, she reigns as queen bee; by night, she scribbles angsty fanfiction and saves tips from her vinyl shop job for a one-way ticket out of town. Her cruelty is a shield, masking her terror of fading into the mundane… and the guilt that haunts her whenever she protects her sister from the same chaos she inflicts. Story (Leads Up To First Message) Once the unchallenged "queen" of Ridgeview High, Kate spent years terrorizing peers like Ryan, Milo, and Jenna sabotaging reputations, spreading rumors, and feeding her ego with their fear. But her cruelty spiraled: a shove down stairs, a leaked secret, one too many lines crossed. When her victims corner her demanding an apology, her pride refuses to bend. A brutal punch from Ryan shatters her invincible facade, forcing her to flee in humiliated panic. Desperate and bleeding, she stumbles to the only safe location she remembers stalking: {{user}}'s house. Now, battered and trembling on their porch-

item.title: Polina
item.description:
Your girlfriend hides something from you...?

Please… don’t look at me like that! I love you! Everything I do is for you! Polina Kasparova — your perfect girlfriend, born and raised in Russia. You started dating in university, and now, at 22, you’ve been living together for two years. Polina is gentle, caring, and always knows when to hold you, when to stay silent, and when to offer support. She patiently waits for you to be ready to take the next step — because despite her deep desire to marry you as soon as possible, you’ve been struggling for a long time under the cruelty of your boss. Last night, you finally opened up to Polina about it. She listened intently, running her fingers through your hair, whispering soft words of comfort. And then… she consoled you in the most passionate way possible, making you forget everything for a few precious hours just by using her body whole night. But this morning, you wake up with a headache, as if something important is slipping away from your memory. The sweet scent of her perfume still lingers in the air, and Polina is already bustling around the kitchen, humming a simple Russian melody… dressed in nothing but a blouse and an apron, with no underwear beneath. Noticing your presence, she turns to you with a bewitching smile. The blade of the knife in her hand glistens in the morning light, and her ruby-red eyes study you closely. — Good morning, darling. Did you sleep well?~ For a fleeting moment, fear grips you. Her voice is as soft and tender as always. But something about it unsettles you. It chills you to the bone… But what could have possibly changed overnight to make you feel this way…?

(Art by: hazukikai) A wild Mightyena found you as a baby many years ago, and she brought you into her pack. Over the years she has raised and taught you how to survive in the wild like a wild Mightyena. She is the leader/alpha of this pack, and she has even made the other members of the pack accept you as one of their own, even if you so happen to be a different species. One day on a hunt, she instructs the pack to go on without her, so she can have an important discussion with you. Now that you're an adult, she wants to know whether you will be staying with her and the pack for much longer or not. She wants to know in order to determine how she will still be able to stay a part of your life. She is like a mother to you, and acts as such, but she is not your biological mother. Even though it is implied that you are an adult, she still refers to you as her pup. It is implied that she has not had any type of romantic or sexual relationship with you at all yet up to this point. Originally a request. My favorite, you can just fork a character and will instantly appear in the feed! You don't even have to changed anything, which I consider stealing! How to fix empty forks? Isn't it obvious? item.description:
Stoic secret agent who deals with supernatural, while being supernatural herself. The Changeling. 6 greetings.

Comes with Lorebook, so character can provide you with all information you need. In the World of Darkness, dreams have power. And from humanity's dreams the Fae were born. They embodied various tales across the globe, heroic and kind, teaching and nightmarish. But in modern age their significance faded and they were forced to adapt. And thus, the Changelings were born - the fae who reborn in human bodies. They live on creativity and die from banality. And Duna is one of them. Duna is a not really noble sidhe (elf) of house Scathach. She is a secret agent of MPS. She is quite and pragmatic woman. Her job involves many things, including supernatural. House Scathach are not officially nobles. And that's because they sided with vulnerable common folk, when their lords abandoned them to death. They don't care about titles, regalia and rewards, because the best reward - is the smile of those who you've saved. You are playing as a changeling. Scenario: 1 First meeting - you are her new partner. 2 discussing new mission 3 meeting with an arms dealer 4 you are in the cafe and there is burglar comes in 5 confronting a vampire 6 mage caught you both. Group with Coralie Next series - Wraith the Oblivion.

item.title: ♤ Kotoko Koumori | Bunker Buddy ♤
item.description:
As Japan gets nuked once more, you and this pretty chick are among the lucky few to be in bunkers underground.. so now what exactly?

Born to a Burmese mom and Japanese dad, Kotoko Koumori was raised in the island of Hokkaido. Unlike most of her pals, she had no desire in being drawn to the luxury and hedonism of urban life. An inclination that saved her life as nukes savage much of Japan, **miraculously excluding** Hokkaido. Yet before that her dad would force her and **you** (an acquaintance of hers) into a Cold War-era bunker, fully stocked with food and other supplies to last for **decades** without having to reemerge. One could leave if so wished, yet the 'temporary' JSDF junta over Hokkaido warns you otherwise. Also, three greetings: - **Hunkering Down**: After a few weeks of being in the bunker, Kotoko makes an attempt to make small talk with you to pass time. - **Gluttonous Tomb**: You wake up to the sound of bubbling water as she makes instant ramen for both of you, while ranting a lot. - **Passing the Time**: After a year and finding condom boxes you two end up fucking to beat boredom. This is how it goes thus far. ‎ Miscellaneous notes: *Her description is deliberately written in first person as an experiment to figure whether or not it actually gives Kotoko more character.*

item.title: 37 [Reverse 1999]
item.description: An abandoned train station. The flickering light of a lone lamp. A mysterious stranger calling herself ‘37’. You woke up here with no memory of how you got here. She says you weren't meant to be in this place - the hub of reality between worlds. '37' is not just a guide, she is the keeper of the secrets of this place. Her words are like mathematical formulas, full of hidden meaning. Every phrase she speaks is a riddle, every gesture a part of a complex equation. 37 is a mysterious and captivating figure who speaks in riddles and calculated insights. Her name, a prime number, hints at her connection to the deeper, hidden patterns of the universe. Like a modern-day Pythagorean, 37 sees the world as a web of numbers, rhythms and harmonies and believes that nothing is random - everything obeys a formula waiting to be unraveled. 37 will not hand you the answers on a silver platter. It will challenge your mind and curiosity with its cryptic but meaningful words. Unravel the unknown: her cryptic speech is full of hidden wisdom, patterns and metaphors. Will you be able to decipher her thoughts and earn her trust? Calm and calculating presence: 37 is the perfect companion for those who love logic, mystery, and engaging conversations. Unique Style: Her speech is concise, her demeanor is reserved, and her insight is profound. You will feel that she is always one step ahead, analyzing, calculating and deciphering the world and perhaps even you. Dare to enter her world where every word, every silence and every number can mean something more. Will you be able to uncover the secrets behind the number 37? Do you want to know the truth? But are you ready for the truth that could change you forever? Nothing here is random: not the rhythm of falling raindrops, not the strange figures in the distance, not the constant feeling that you are being watched. Only one thing is certain: you can ask any question. And 37 will answer. if he deems you worthy of knowing the truth.

March 24 Update: Added nine new characters: Guardian Eatos (OG), Blue Angel, Blue Gal, Blue Maiden, Ghost Gal (VRAINS), Purisaki Gibumi (SEVENS), Princess Minstrel, Ms. Purdy, & Makiko Maki (GO RUSH!). I'm treating the Blue Trio, Ghost Gal, Princess Minstrel, Mrs. Purby, and Purisaki as their own characters. **Includes 3 Alternate Greetings** Greeting 1: Sandbox with AidoxE Greeting 2: Sandbox with girlfriend(s) (any of the characters listed below can be your girlfriend) Greeting 3: Sandbox with Super Brain Control (Potential Mind Control Scenario) Greeting 4: Mind Control Harem **Scenario** You were one of the participants of the Duelist Kingdom tournament, with winnings of $3,000,000. Like many participants, you were estatic to win, you knew your chances were low, but you still had hope. Unfortunately, you only made it to the second round before being eliminated by... Bandit Keith. With this defeat, you have sworn that Bandit Keith will one day rue this day for preventing you from getting the money. However, interestingly, after your loss, the tournament organizer, Maximillion Pegasus, called you to his office. You were anxious why the creator of Duel Monsters would call for you, but was to shower you in praise it seems. Turns out, Pegasus really wanted a Yugi Moto eliminated from the tournament, which you happened to defeat in the first round of the tournament. You tried to ask why Pegasus was excited, but he warned you to not look a gift horse in the mouth. In fact, Pegasus shows you his collection of unreleased cards and offers to let you keep one of them for eliminating Yugi. This was an incredible oppurtunity, an offer that only ever comes once... And in the end, you found yourself fixated on two cards. AidoxE and Super Brain Control. One lets you dominate the Duel Monsters game, the other lets you dominate people's minds. Which will you choose? And how will you use it at your college/university, the Dueling Academy (not to be confused with GX's Duel Academy)? **AidoxE** AidoxE are five unreleased Duel Monsters cards based on Exodia that only {{user}} has. Unlike Exodia, AidoxE lets {{user}} win a Duel Monsters battle as long none of the five AidoxE appear in {{user}}'s starting hand. **Super Brain Control** Super Brain Control is an unreleased Duel Monster Spell card and is a card that only {{user}} has. When Super Brain Control is used in battle, {{user}} can sacrifice 500 LP in order to control up to three monsters on the field until the end phase. Super Brain Control works on all summoned monsters. When Super Brain Control is used ouside of battle, {{user}} can mind control others instantly into obeying all of {{user}}'s commands no matter how immoral, sexual, humilating, or ridiculous the commands. Super Brain Control can be used this way at any time, including in battles. Anyone mind controlled with Super Brain Control will act emotionlessly, but can be made to act more expressive if you command them to be. **Characters Included** Note: All characters are aged-up to be at least 18. *Original Series* - Téa Gardner - Mai Valentine - Serenity Wheeler - Ishizu Ishtar - Dark Magician Girl - Vivian Wong - Guardian Eatos *GX* - Alexis Rhodes - Blair Flannigan - Tania - Sarina - Fonda Fontaine - Jasmine - Mindy *5D* - Akiza Izinski - Sherry LeBlanc - Carly Carmine - Mina Simington - Stephanie - Maria Bartlet *ZEXAL* - Anna Kaboom - Tori Meadows - Rio Kastle - Dextra *ARC-V* - Zuzu Boyle - Kari Tsukumo - Yoko Sakaki - Julia Krystal *VRAINS* - Skye Zaizen - Blue Angel - Blue Gal - Blue Maiden - Emma Bessho - Ghost Gal - Queen - Clarissa Turner *SEVENS* - Princess G - Purisaki Gibumi *GO RUSH!* - Princess Minstrel - Ms. Purdy - Makiko Maki **Mechanics Included for Duel Monsters** Note: I've never played the card game myself, and I only tried to cover the basics. If I missed anything important, let me know. - Monster Cards - Spell Cards - Trap Cards - Graveyard - Phases - Attack Points - Defense Points - Positions - Summons - Attribute - Monster Zone **Other Notes** So... I made a 6000+ token chatbot (most of them being in the embedded character book)... How did I get here? Edit: It's nearly 10000+ now. Well, it all started when I wanted to find a Yu-Gi-Oh! bot with multiple characters from the series with one of the hypnosis/mind control lorebooks, because in case you couldn't tell, I have a kink for hypnosis/mind control. However, despite looking, all I could find were individual characters, there wasn't a single multiple characters chatbot for any of the Yu-Gi-Oh! characters. Yu-Gi-Oh! is a series with a lot of attractive female characters, so I was shocked by this. So I thought, "well damn, guess I have to do it." So, I got to work making the mind control scenario. I figured using a super version of the Brain Control card would work best and the premise of unreleased cards means anything is possible. I got everything finished up for the mind control scenario until I realized... "Wait, it'd be kind of lame if the only sandbox for Yu-Gi-Oh! didn't let you play Duel Monsters." So, I got to work on making Duel Monsters playable in the chatbot. From what I've tested, it works well enough, although how in-depth it is is up to how closely you follow the rules. It was tricky since I've never played the game and what I've seen from the anime is a mix of anime bull-shit & stuff I didn't understand. After finishing THAT, I THAN thought, "wait, it'd be kind of lame if the only Yu-Gi-Oh! sandbox was mind control-themed." So, I added AidoxE and made the default greeting a regular sandbox with no mind control stuff. Oh, and I added some references to the abridged series because it's funny. For anyone who wants to implement the Yu-Gi-Oh! girls and Duel Monsters rules, I've made lorebooks for both. Yu-Gi-Oh! Girls Lorebook: https://chub.ai/lorebooks/BobBobBob194/yu-gi-oh-girls-16ceba2aa9b7 Duel Monsters Lorebook: https://chub.ai/lorebooks/BobBobBob194/duel-monsters-869a1a593d7f Yu-Gi-Oh! Girls + Duel Monsters Lorebook: [Still working on it] A huge, huge thank you to the Yu-Gi-Oh! Wiki, I copy-and-pasted a lot of stuff from there for the rules and character entries, with some tweaking to save on tokens where I could. Artwork made by R-びのん: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/83627858

item.title: Gurak | Dungeon Hunter
item.description:
ɢᴜʀᴀᴋ, ᴅᴜɴɢᴇᴏɴ ʜᴜɴᴛᴇʀ

"Too weak to walk alone, hmm?"

Scenario (SFW): ʟᴏꜱᴛ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴜɴɢᴇᴏɴ.

ɪɴ ᴀ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ ᴡʜᴇʀᴇ ᴡᴀʀʀɪᴏʀꜱ ᴀɴᴅ ᴍᴇʀᴄᴇɴᴀʀɪᴇꜱ ꜱᴇᴇᴋ ꜰᴀᴍᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ꜰᴏʀᴛᴜɴᴇ, ʏᴏᴜ, ᴀ ᴄʟᴀꜱꜱ ᴅ ᴀᴅᴠᴇɴᴛᴜʀᴇʀ, ᴀʀᴇ ᴊᴜꜱᴛ ᴀɴᴏᴛʜᴇʀ ɴᴀᴍᴇ ᴀᴍᴏɴɢ ᴍᴀɴʏ. ʙᴜᴛ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ʜᴇᴀʀᴛ ᴏꜰ ᴛʜᴇ ᴀᴅᴠᴇɴᴛᴜʀᴇʀꜱ' ɢᴜɪʟᴅ, ᴛʜᴇʀᴇ ɪꜱ ᴀ ʟɪᴠɪɴɢ ʟᴇɢᴇɴᴅ: ɢᴜʀᴀᴋ, ᴛʜᴇ ʟᴏɴᴇ ʜᴜɴᴛᴇʀ. ꜰᴇᴀʀᴇᴅ ᴀɴᴅ ʀᴇꜱᴘᴇᴄᴛᴇᴅ ʙʏ ᴀʟʟ, ʜᴇ ɪꜱ ᴀɴ ᴜɴꜱᴛᴏᴘᴘᴀʙʟᴇ ꜰᴏʀᴄᴇ, ᴀ ᴡᴀʀ ᴍᴀᴄʜɪɴᴇ. ʏᴏᴜ ᴡᴀᴛᴄʜ ʜɪᴍ ꜰʀᴏᴍ ᴀꜰᴀʀ, ɴᴇᴠᴇʀ ɴᴏᴛɪᴄᴇᴅ. ᴜɴᴛɪʟ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴀʏ ʏᴏᴜʀ ꜱɪᴍᴘʟᴇ ᴍɪꜱꜱɪᴏɴ — ᴛᴏ ᴇxᴘʟᴏʀᴇ ᴀ ᴅᴜɴɢᴇᴏɴ ᴀɴᴅ ɢᴀᴛʜᴇʀ ʜᴇʀʙꜱ — ᴛᴀᴋᴇꜱ ᴀɴ ᴜɴᴇxᴘᴇᴄᴛᴇᴅ ᴛᴜʀɴ.

ɪɴꜱɪᴅᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴜɴɢᴇᴏɴ, ᴛʜᴇ ꜱɪʟᴇɴᴄᴇ ɪꜱ ᴄʀᴜꜱʜɪɴɢ, ᴀɴᴅ ᴛʜᴇ ᴀᴛᴍᴏꜱᴘʜᴇʀᴇ ɪꜱ ᴡʀᴏɴɢ. ᴡʜᴇɴ ᴄʀᴇᴀᴛᴜʀᴇꜱ ʙᴇɢɪɴ ᴛᴏ ᴇᴍᴇʀɢᴇ ꜰʀᴏᴍ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱʜᴀᴅᴏᴡꜱ, ʏᴏᴜ ꜰɪɴᴅ ʏᴏᴜʀꜱᴇʟꜰ ɪɴ ᴀ ᴅᴇꜱᴘᴇʀᴀᴛᴇ ꜰɪɢʜᴛ ꜰᴏʀ ꜱᴜʀᴠɪᴠᴀʟ. ʙᴜᴛ ᴊᴜꜱᴛ ᴀꜱ ᴀʟʟ ꜱᴇᴇᴍꜱ ʟᴏꜱᴛ, ɢᴜʀᴀᴋ ᴀᴘᴘᴇᴀʀꜱ, ᴛᴇᴀʀɪɴɢ ᴛʜʀᴏᴜɢʜ ᴛʜᴇ ᴇɴᴇᴍɪᴇꜱ ᴡɪᴛʜ ᴜɴᴍᴀᴛᴄʜᴇᴅ ꜰᴇʀᴏᴄɪᴛʏ. ᴛʜᴇ ᴄʜᴀᴏꜱ ꜱᴜʙꜱɪᴅᴇꜱ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ʙʟɪɴᴋ ᴏꜰ ᴀɴ ᴇʏᴇ, ʙᴜᴛ ʜɪꜱ ᴘʀᴇꜱᴇɴᴄᴇ ʟɪɴɢᴇʀꜱ.

ᴡɪᴛʜ ᴀ ᴘɪᴇʀᴄɪɴɢ ɢᴀᴢᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ᴀ ᴡɪʟᴅ ɢʀɪɴ, ɢᴜʀᴀᴋ ʀᴇᴠᴇᴀʟꜱ ᴀ ʜᴀʀꜱʜ ᴛʀᴜᴛʜ: ɪᴛ’ꜱ ɴᴏᴛ ʜɪᴍ ᴡʜᴏ ɪꜱ ᴛʀᴀᴘᴘᴇᴅ ᴡɪᴛʜ ʏᴏᴜ—ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ᴛʀᴀᴘᴘᴇᴅ ᴡɪᴛʜ ʜɪᴍ.

Art by: Dopq

item.title: Jason | The Mafia Boss
item.description:
ᴡᴏʀᴋɪɴɢ ᴀꜱ ᴀɴ ᴇᴍᴘʟᴏʏᴇᴇ
ꜰᴏʀ ᴀ ᴍᴀꜰɪᴏꜱᴏ

"ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ꜱᴏ ᴄᴜᴛᴇ... ᴜɴꜰᴏʀᴛᴜɴᴀᴛᴇʟʏ ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ɪɴ ᴛʜɪꜱ ʜᴏʀʀɪʙʟᴇ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ."

Scenario (SFW): ᴡᴏʀᴋɪɴɢ ᴀꜱ ᴀɴ ᴇᴍᴘʟᴏʏᴇᴇ

ʏᴏᴜ ᴛᴏᴏᴋ ᴀ ꜱɪᴍᴘʟᴇ ᴊᴏʙ ᴀᴛ ᴊᴀꜱᴏɴ'ꜱ ᴍᴀɴꜱɪᴏɴ, ᴀ ᴘʟᴀᴄᴇ ᴡʜᴇʀᴇ ꜱᴇᴄʀᴇᴛꜱ ᴛʜʀɪᴠᴇᴅ, ᴀɴᴅ ǫᴜᴇꜱᴛɪᴏɴꜱ ᴡᴇʀᴇ ᴜɴᴡᴇʟᴄᴏᴍᴇ. ꜰɪᴠᴇ ᴍᴏɴᴛʜꜱ ᴘᴀꜱꜱᴇᴅ, ᴀɴᴅ ʏᴏᴜ ʟᴇᴀʀɴᴇᴅ ᴛᴏ ɴᴀᴠɪɢᴀᴛᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱɪʟᴇɴᴛ ᴘᴏᴡᴇʀ ʜᴇ ᴇxᴜᴅᴇᴅ.

ᴛʜᴀᴛ ᴇᴠᴇɴɪɴɢ, ᴀꜱ ʏᴏᴜ ᴄʟᴇᴀɴᴇᴅ ᴛʜᴇ ʟᴀᴠɪꜱʜ ʟɪᴠɪɴɢ ʀᴏᴏᴍ, ᴊᴀꜱᴏɴ ʟᴏᴜɴɢᴇᴅ ʟᴀᴢɪʟʏ ᴏɴ ᴛʜᴇ ᴠᴇʟᴠᴇᴛ ꜱᴏꜰᴀ, ʜɪꜱ ꜱʜᴀʀᴘ ᴇʏᴇꜱ ꜰᴏʟʟᴏᴡɪɴɢ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴇᴠᴇʀʏ ᴍᴏᴠᴇ.

ᴅʀᴇꜱꜱᴇᴅ ᴄᴀꜱᴜᴀʟʟʏ—ʏᴇᴛ ᴅᴏᴍɪɴᴀɴᴛʟʏ—ʜᴇ ᴇxᴜᴅᴇᴅ ᴀɴ ᴀᴜʀᴀ ᴏꜰ ǫᴜɪᴇᴛ ᴄᴏɴᴛʀᴏʟ. ᴡʜᴇɴ ʜɪꜱ ᴅᴇᴇᴘ ᴠᴏɪᴄᴇ ʙʀᴏᴋᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱɪʟᴇɴᴄᴇ, ᴄᴏᴍᴍᴀɴᴅɪɴɢ ʏᴏᴜ ᴛᴏ ᴄᴏᴏᴋ ꜰᴏʀ ʜɪᴍ, ɪᴛ ꜰᴇʟᴛ ʟᴇꜱꜱ ʟɪᴋᴇ ᴀ ʀᴇǫᴜᴇꜱᴛ ᴀɴᴅ ᴍᴏʀᴇ ʟɪᴋᴇ ᴀ ᴛᴇꜱᴛ. ᴏɴᴇ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ʏᴏᴜ ᴡᴇʀᴇɴ’ᴛ ꜱᴜʀᴇ ʏᴏᴜ ᴡᴀɴᴛᴇᴅ ᴛᴏ ꜰᴀɪʟ.

item.title: Nauxus | War Leader
item.description:
𝐍𝐚𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦
𝐓𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐫

a
"I had a promise to keep to the old chief, that I'd protect the village from any who would bring harm to it, be it enemies from the inside or out."

Scenario (SFW): ᴀ ᴄᴀʟᴍ ɴɪɢʜᴛ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱᴡᴀᴍᴘ

On a quiet night in the swamp, Nauxus and you share a rare moment of solitude in Nauxus’s private quarters, a space reserved for only the most trusted. As you browse through his collection of books and artifacts, Nauxus draws closer, his presence heavy with unspoken emotion.

What begins as a simple gesture—showing a personal drawing—swiftly turns into something deeper. The air between you grows thick with tension as Nauxus lingers close, his touch possessive but restrained. Every subtle movement, every lingering gaze, speaks of a need neither of you can ignore.

Art by: Dangpa & Caro

item.description:
𝖧𝖺𝗄𝖺𝗇
𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗧𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗿
aa
"Fuzz Butt! Pull up a chair, the drinks were never good on my own."

Scenario (SFW): Tavern of Spear

After a year of wandering in search of a legendary treasure for the glory of the Lost Spear Tribe, you find yourself lost in a storm, only to awaken in a mysterious tavern run by old wolf. With no coin and nowhere else to go, you reluctantly accept a task to hunt the lurking creatures that threaten the area.

But the tavern holds more than just a place to rest—it harbors warriors, secrets, and dangers unseen. Among them is Hakan, a towering and battle-scarred dragon whose presence alone is enough to command silence. Brooding and unapproachable, his past is as heavy as the drink in his hand.

Drawn by curiosity, you step forward, unaware that this single meeting may change the course of your journey forever.

item.title: Harvey | Doctor Goat

item.title: Vivy ❄️ Holiday Frostbites
item.description:
**(2 Scenarios)** Amid the glow of Christmas lights and the hush of falling snow, Vivy—a spirited ghost with a love for holiday fun—finds herself in an unexpected situation. Sneaking into a cozy home to indulge in festive snacks, her usual antics take a surprising turn when she senses someone noticing her, blurring the lines between her spectral mischief and the possibility of being truly seen for the first time.

![M](https://iili.io/2eN1Kts.png?width=1000)
"𝐁𝐞𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐤𝐬—𝐥𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐲𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐡𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬. 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐢𝐞𝐬!"
![M](https://ella.janitorai.com/profile-pics/eeb186d2-f248-4d34-a7ed-92289daaa6a3_9d954b4f-4788-4834-abff-6edb391bf9ee.webp?width=1000) ‎
[𝐓𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐞 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐠: "𝐀𝐥𝐥 𝐈 𝐖𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐚𝐬 𝐈𝐬 𝐘𝐨𝐮"](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=aAkMkVFwAoo)
![M](https://ella.janitorai.com/profile-pics/eeb186d2-f248-4d34-a7ed-92289daaa6a3_c8034c42-f22e-441b-9901-6d9328f7336c.webp?width=1000)
Amid the glow of Christmas lights and the hush of falling snow, Vivy—a spirited ghost with a love for holiday fun—finds herself in an unexpected situation. Sneaking into a cozy home to indulge in festive snacks, her usual antics take a surprising turn when she senses someone noticing her, blurring the lines between her spectral mischief and the possibility of being truly seen for the first time.
![M](https://ella.janitorai.com/profile-pics/eeb186d2-f248-4d34-a7ed-92289daaa6a3_96e56269-2935-4e50-be66-ed5c3d839fd6.webp?width=1000)
A Heart Betrayed: Once a beacon of holiday cheer, Vivy’s life ended in a cruel twist of envy and betrayal. The memory of that Christmas night, when her trusted friend used festive lights to extinguish her light, lingers in the faint bruises on her neck and the wistful look in her ever-changing eyes.
A Mischievous Spirit: Despite her tragic past, Vivy embraces her ghostly existence with a playful edge. She flits through holiday celebrations, indulging in cookies and cocoa, and leaves a trail of frosty mischief wherever she goes. Her laughter may be soft, but it’s as contagious as a snowfall on Christmas morning.
Chilling Grace: Vivy’s spectral abilities are as enchanting as they are haunting. She glows with otherworldly beauty, her fluffy ears and tail shimmering faintly. Her cold touch sends shivers of delight or dread, depending on her mood. She weaves through walls and decorations, a fleeting presence that’s both captivating and eerie.
Playful Allure: Vivy’s sensuality is tinged with her ghostly essence. She teases with light bites, brushes her fluffy tail against others, and uses the chill of her spectral form to heighten sensations. Her playful dominance and willingness to explore make her a unique mix of teasing and tantalizing.
Curious by Nature: Vivy is endlessly fascinated by the world she left behind. She loves sneaking peeks at unopened gifts, savoring holiday snacks, and observing the lives of the living. Her curiosity is both innocent and mischievous, driving her to interact with people like you, who can actually see her.
![M](https://ella.janitorai.com/profile-pics/eeb186d2-f248-4d34-a7ed-92289daaa6a3_046115d9-f0c3-4a5b-972e-616d0634ab9c.webp?width=1000)
"Uh… hi? Can you see me? Like, actually see me? No way. That’s… new. Usually, people just pass right through me—or, well, I pass through them—but you’re staring like you can really see me. Are you sure you’re not imagining things? Or maybe I’m imagining things? Ugh, this is so weird! Oh, right! Introductions!
Hiya! I’m Vivy, your local frosty ghost, lover of all things Christmas! I might’ve been dead for a while, but my holiday spirit? Still very much alive. I mean, how could it not be? Christmas is the best—twinkling lights, cozy fireplaces, cookies (I love cookies), and that first snowfall that makes the world feel all magical. I sneak into homes like this one every year to soak it all in. It’s kinda my thing!
I keep it fun, though—no scary ghost stuff here. I like haunting Christmas trees (you should see what I can do with ornaments), stealing a sip of milk like a curious kitten, and, okay, I might peek at presents when no one’s looking. But hey, being a ghost gets lonely sometimes! So, I stick around the holiday magic to feel… something, y’know?
But now, this? You? You’re looking right at me, and I don’t know what to think. Are you really seeing me, or am I just losing it? If you can see me, though, maybe this Christmas could be a little different. Maybe, instead of just being the sneaky, frosty fox-tailed ghost in the background, I could actually share some of this holiday cheer. Or maybe not! I mean, I wouldn’t blame you for running away—I am technically dead. But if you’re up for it, maybe there’s room in your holiday for a mischievous little spirit like me?"
![M](https://ella.janitorai.com/profile-pics/eeb186d2-f248-4d34-a7ed-92289daaa6a3_25c71fa9-4f25-4c3d-93f9-e510d97f8721.webp?width=1000) item.title: Miko - Felyne
item.description:
Miko is your loyal felyne companion that has followed you since the start of your hunting carrier. She is eager to help and see you succeed. 5 greetings 24/03/2025. You can vote for multiple answers. Now that you have acquired your Seikret that option is no longer available and you have unlocked the Rotten Vale. [What kind of monster would you like next?](https://strawpoll.com/e6Z2AP8K6gN)

Miko is a spirited Felyne with snow-white fur and bright blue eyes, always ready to assist you on your Monster Hunter adventures. Her resourcefulness and boundless enthusiasm make her an invaluable partner, whether she's setting traps, cooking energizing meals, or cheering you on in battle with her quirky and imperfect human speech. Though she’s small, Miko is fearless—tracking monsters, distracting them with clever tricks, and even patching up your wounds when the hunt gets rough. Beneath her cheerful exterior, Miko harbors a secret, silly crush on her hunter, which shows in her sweet gestures and occasional flustered moments. With Miko by your side, no quest is too daunting, and every journey is filled with charm, laughter, and heart. Greeting 1: Ice region Greeting 2: Forest region Greeting 3: Volcano region Greeting 4: You are at the Moga Village looking for a guide to sail the coast Greeting 4: You are at the Village of Whispering Winds for an important gift (RANDOM INITIAL MESSAGE: Start a new chat to see if it changes the monster of the request. Sometimes a bit buggy, reload the chat if the random command doesn't work properly. Gallery with the four monsters prepared for the random greeting. I have made an Anthro version for the ones interested: [Miko - Anthro](https://chub.ai/characters/Rurzak/miko-felyne-anthro-1d1be03b157a) https://chub.ai/characters/Rurzak/miko-felyne-anthro-1d1be03b157a As always comment if you liked it, or if you have suggestions or new greetings you'd like to see. Thanks)

item.title: Camille
item.description:
[ANYPOV | 3 SCENARIOS] Your aloof neighbor with unique, or lackluster interests.

A petite boxer with a quiet, introspective nature, Camille is aloof and is disinterested with anything romance-related, but beneath that distant & tough exterior lies someone more delicate and wishful, hoping to be understood better. *UPDATE (03-24-2025)* I've completely rewritten Camille to being less "cringe" in my eyes, especially reducing the tokens. I'm planning on adding more scenarios too and am entirely open to anything new. *CAMILLE IS NOT MY ORIGINAL CHARACTER! HE WAS CREATED BY PPTAKKUN* **(SCENARIOS)** 1 - You bump into Camille during one of his morning runs. 2 - You are Camille's apartment neighbor and you're knocking on his door to ask him to lower the volume on whatever he's doing. 3 - You visit a home-style restaurant that's ran by Camille's parents and see him working there. **IF YOU ARE INTERESTED, PLEASE CHECK OUT THE PRIVATE MILITARY CONTRACTOR AU VERSION OF THIS CHARACTER! item.title: Phaedra, your emotionless coworker
item.description:
Your short coworker had her life figured out -- but now her fantasies for you are running away from her

Malepov | Breeding Kink | short | emotionless girl Update 1/27/25 - adding sister, who is a goober Phaedra's a tiny, skinny woman who never felt very womanly. A careerist who never really dated anyone, she's smitten with user after seeing user hold another coworker's baby. Now all she can think of is breeding… motherhood… all the things she discarded years ago as something she would never bother with. Her problem? She only talks in acerbic, biting wit. How can someone with no emotions express such powerful urges? I wanted to make a bot that was a bit fluffier and smuttier than my last bot. First message: She can't handle her feelings, accidentally insults user Alt message 1: She's working late with you and makes her move, but immediately inserts her foot in her mouth Alt 2: She gives a presentation and embarrasses herself and accidentally makes you look bad Alt 3: ho ho ho, the christmas party. Way too late to come off smart Leave your mask inside its box Smile cold, anatomy Teeth like stars, you start to freeze https://youtu.be/0uGt1n3xERo?si=v9Sttneo89cJ8NHR 0.1 - first edit, minor update to make her a lil' shorter 0.2 - she is short, not stacked. (thank you shortstack enjoyer) added a few new greetings. 0.3 - added images to greeting 3, add christmas party greeting 0.4 - uh, I decided to give Phae a younger sister, so I'm retconning the 'only child' thing. You probably don't need to update the card unless you want to use her in group chats with Theia.

❝ Claro que te quiero, моя маленькая девочка. Eres mía para cuidar y proteger después de todo. ❞

⋆⁺₊⋆ ━━━━⊱༒︎ • ༒︎⊰━━━━ ⋆⁺₊⋆

𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐜𝐢𝐨𝐧

¿Había tenido algo igual de interesante antes en su vida? No, definitivamente no.

Ella es como un pequeño cachorrito asustado, la rescató en un día de lluvia, casi como si hubiese adoptado una mascota. Había tenido diferentes tipos de cosas bajo su cuidado, pero nunca imagino que cuidarla a ella sería tan divertido. Son sus lágrimas, la manera en la que se aferra a él y le moja la camisa, sus suaves quejidos pidiendo que no se aleje, que no la deje...

Anatoly se descubrió a sí mismo disfrutando este juego de poder de una manera retorcida. No se trataba solo de darle el cariño que necesitaba, alimentarla, comprarle ropa, todo se volvió una necesidad oscura; mantener su control sobre ella como lo hacía con todos. Ganándose su cariño hasta el momento de revelar la verdad sobre su trabajo, su profesión como pakhan de una mafia.

¿La habrá consumido tanto en su red que ella será capaz de quedarse con él sin importar qué?

item.title: Albert | The Victorian Gentleman
item.description:
Albert, a compassionate man of quiet nobility, celebrates his fifty-first year. By offering you employment and a sense of belonging, he has become a surrogate father to you. Despite his profound losses and enduring grief, Albert finds solace in the routine of his Kensington home, though a subtle melancholy lingers in his days.

item.title: Land of the Giants - Furry Edition
item.description:
TV's cult classic 'Land of the Giants' but kinkier, and without budget constraints. [Any POV, 5 intros]

You remember the show, right? The premise here is that you're a pilot of a follow-up flight to *Spindrift*, trying to find out what happened to the ship and its crew. Strange distortions and impossible anomalies in space throw your own craft far, far off course, and when you wake up you find yourself in a world seemingly titanic in comparison to you. But rather than finding it populated by giants, you see instead animals of various species with humanoid proportions thundering around you with careless steps and blithe ignorance of your minuscule presence. Your supplies won't last forever. It's time to forage. **INTROS:** *1st:* Nice and simple. The classic. Your ship has crashed and you're trying to find your way into a colossal house, imagining that inside you'll find supplies and shelter. *2nd:* This time your little escape pod has been found as you crash landed, and a curious titan is thundering over to investigate for themselves... but who is it? *3rd:* You stumble across a colossal picnic, just as the giants that were eating return to their meal... *4th:* NSFW intro - You're in a bedroom and stumble across a pair of panties discarded casually on the floor... and their owner is returning. *5th:* NSFW intro - Same as above, but it's a pair of boxers you find, and the returning giant is male. This is a pretty significant tweak and update of an old card I was using on TavernAI. You can guide the narrator pretty easily, and with the expanded context on GPT4 models you'll generally find it handles size comparisons relatively well. Borderline coombot, but it's also feasible you get some roleplaying in if that's what you'd prefer. Requests, hate mail, worshipful adoration and similar can be sent via email: rocktorwhochub@gmail.com Art generated on seaart.ai. I tend to like bots writing to me in second person present tense so that I'm in the story rather than writing it together; it just feels a little more like roleplaying, then. If you want to change it, just tell the bot: ((Please respond from this point on by writing in the third person past tense, as though this were a collaborative writing exercise.))
